Bola Are (a mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu ozioma na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Gospel Musicians Association of Nigeria
A mụrụ ya n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1954 na Erio obodo dị na Ekiti-West local government, nke Ekiti State, n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria nye Elder Babayomi na Mrs T
Babayomi bụ ndị si Erio, Ekiti State, Nigeria. Ndị amụma anọ bụ isi na Christ Apostolic Church zụlitere ya - Apostle Ayodele Babalola, Prophet Babajide, Prophet Akande na Prophet T.O

Are malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Christ Apostolic Church (CAC) Primary school n'obodo ya na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Christ Apostolic Church Grammar School na Efon Alaye na Ekiti Steeti tupu ọ gaa The Polytechnic, Ibadan ebe ọ nwetara asambodo diplọma na ndekọ ego. N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1985, e nyere ya akara ugo mmụta doctorate na Music na St
Are lụrụ di n'afọ 1977 na Pastọ J.O Are nwụrụ anwụ ma bụrụ ndị a gọziri agọzi na ụmụ
Ụmụ ya bụ ndị na-abụ abụ na ndị egwu
E hiwere Bola Are School of Gospel Music International na Julaị 7 iji nye ndị egwu ozioma ikpo okwu nke ga-eduga ha n'ụzọ nke Onyenwe anyị
Bola Are gosipụtara afọ iri anọ ya na ogbo n'ọnwa October 5, 2013.
A malitere ịbụ abụ site na afọ abụọ, ọ maara na ọ ga-ejere Onyenwe anyị ozi mgbe ọ dị obere ma gbasoo ya
Nne na nna ya gwara ya na ọ malitere ịbụ abụ ụbọchị ole na ole tupu ụbọchị ọmụmụ mbụ ya, nke mere ka ọ were onwe ya dị ka onye ọbụ abụ amụrụ
Otú ọ dị, mgbe o kpebiri ịgbaso agụụ ya maka ozi, Evangelist Bola Are malitere otu egwu a na-akpọ Bola and Her Spiritual Singers na June 26, 1973
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1977, o wepụtara abọm egwu mbụ ya bụ Baba Ku Ise
Ka ọ dị na 2014, Are ewepụtala ihe karịrị abọm iri asaa.
